files.content:
project_name = "url-shortener"
environment  = "dev"
aws_region   = "us-east-1"

# Provide either:
# 1) acm_certificate_arn (existing cert in same region), OR
# 2) domain_name + hosted_zone_id to create/validate a new cert.

# domain_name     = "short.example.com"
# hosted_zone_id  = "Z1234567890ABCDEFG"
# acm_certificate_arn = ""

# If you already built/pushed an image, set image_uri.
# Otherwise, this stack creates an ECR repo and expects tag 'latest'.
# image_uri = "123456789012.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/url-shortener-dev:latest"
